title: Where to Watch Every Kung Fu Panda Movie Online in 2024
description: Our up-to-date streaming guide on how to watch all of the Kung Fu Panda movies online.
author: Connor Sheppard
excerpt: Our up-to-date streaming guide on how to watch all of the Kung Fu Panda movies online.
text: A streaming guide to watch all Kung Fu Panda moviesThe Kung Fu Panda movies are some of the most iconic animated films that perfectly blend comedy, family values, and well-animated action. With the most recent entry, Kung Fu Panda 4, the series continues to entertain and impress audiences worldwide. Unfortunately, streaming all of the Kung Fu Panda movies online has been a bit of a challenge as of late as the films are mostly unavailable to stream with any paid subscription.If you're wondering where you can watch all of the Kung Fu Panda movies right now, we've got you covered with an up-to-date guide for 2024 below. The latest addition to the series, Kung Fu Panda 4, is available to stream on Peacock TV just like the other three. We will update this with new information as it is released.Where to Watch the Kung Fu Panda Movies OnlineAs of October 2024 the Kung Fu Panda movies are now spread across multiple streaming services. You can watch the first and third films on Netflix, while Kung Fu Panda 4 is only available to stream on Peacock. There is currently no streaming service that offers Kung Fu Panda 2. You can also rent or buy all of these films digitally. Check out where to watch each movie below:Kung Fu Panda (2008)Kung Fu Panda 2 (2011)Kung Fu Panda 3 (2016)Kung Fu Panda 4 (2024)Kung Fu Panda 4K UHD and Blu-Ray SetsFor those that prefer in-home viewing on their Blu-Ray compatible devices, all four Kung Fu Panda movies are available in a 4-disc Blu-Ray set. Kung Fu Panda: 4-Movie Collection (Blu-ray + Digital)Looking for more physical movies? Check out our guide to all of the upcoming Blu-ray releases.How Many Kung Fu Panda Movies are There?There are currently 4 Kung Fu Panda movies in the series, as well as a few Kung Fu Panda TV series. The most popular of which, Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight, currently has 3 seasons which you can watch on Netflix right now. Currently, there are no solid confirmations of a Kung Fu Panda 5 but considering the box-office success of Kung Fu Panda 4, it seems highly likely.Connor Sheppard is an Oregon-grown culture writer for IGN with previous work on The Manual. Intrigued from a young age by pop culture and movies, he has developed into an experienced critic and consumer of all things media. From his time earning a bachelor's degree in digital communications at Oregon State University, he found a love for writing and appreciating specific actors and directors in the many films he watches. When he's not tapping away on his computer, you can find him watching new movies, practicing Muay Thai, or spending time with great friends and family. html:
A streaming guide to watch all Kung Fu Panda movies

The Kung Fu Panda movies are some of the most iconic animated films that perfectly blend comedy, family values, and well-animated action. With the most recent entry, Kung Fu Panda 4, the series continues to entertain and impress audiences worldwide. Unfortunately, streaming all of the Kung Fu Panda movies online has been a bit of a challenge as of late as the films are mostly unavailable to stream with any paid subscription.

If you're wondering where you can watch all of the Kung Fu Panda movies right now, we've got you covered with an up-to-date guide for 2024 below. The latest addition to the series, Kung Fu Panda 4, is available to stream on Peacock TV just like the other three. We will update this with new information as it is released.

Where to Watch the Kung Fu Panda Movies Online

As of October 2024 the Kung Fu Panda movies are now spread across multiple streaming services. You can watch the first and third films on Netflix, while Kung Fu Panda 4 is only available to stream on Peacock. There is currently no streaming service that offers Kung Fu Panda 2. You can also rent or buy all of these films digitally. Check out where to watch each movie below:

Kung Fu Panda (2008)

Kung Fu Panda 2 (2011)

Kung Fu Panda 3 (2016)

Kung Fu Panda 4 (2024)

Kung Fu Panda 4K UHD and Blu-Ray Sets

For those that prefer in-home viewing on their Blu-Ray compatible devices, all four Kung Fu Panda movies are available in a 4-disc Blu-Ray set.

Kung Fu Panda: 4-Movie Collection (Blu-ray + Digital)

Looking for more physical movies? Check out our guide to all of the upcoming Blu-ray releases.

How Many Kung Fu Panda Movies are There?

There are currently 4 Kung Fu Panda movies in the series, as well as a few Kung Fu Panda TV series. The most popular of which, Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight, currently has 3 seasons which you can watch on Netflix right now. Currently, there are no solid confirmations of a Kung Fu Panda 5 but considering the box-office success of Kung Fu Panda 4, it seems highly likely.

Connor Sheppard is an Oregon-grown culture writer for IGN with previous work on The Manual. Intrigued from a young age by pop culture and movies, he has developed into an experienced critic and consumer of all things media. From his time earning a bachelor's degree in digital communications at Oregon State University, he found a love for writing and appreciating specific actors and directors in the many films he watches. When he's not tapping away on his computer, you can find him watching new movies, practicing Muay Thai, or spending time with great friends and family.

Originally posted: Oct 10, 2024 6:02 pm
